participant_1.background:
I love trying new foods from different cultures, but my favorite type of food is comfort food.
my husband is an author and we have twins together.
I'm a florist from the Pacific Northwest.
i really like cake and do not prefer vegetables.
i love trips to the beach.

participant_2.background:
I once had a panic attack in front of my entire class.
i collect single malt scotch.
I live in a place with a warm climate where I can keep my iguana.
I sometimes eat candy because it reminds me of my childhood.
i eat out more than three times a week.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
That's interesting. I'm a florist from the Pacific Northwest.
Oh cool! I love the Pacific Northwest. I once had a panic attack in front of my entire class.
Oh no! I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you're doing better now.
Thank you. I am doing much better now. I live in a warm climate where I can keep my iguana.
That's cool! I love animals. I have two dogs and a cat.
I love animals too! My husband is an author and we have twins together.
That's awesome! I love reading. What kind of books does your husband write?
Oh cool! I love romance novels.
We're both big foodies. We love trying new foods from different cultures, but our favorite type of food is comfort food.
Me too! I love trying new foods and cooking new dishes. I love going to the beach, but I'm not a big fan of vegetables.
I sometimes eat candy because it reminds me of my childhood. I eat out more than three times a week.
I love cake! I'm not a big fan of candy, but I love cake. I usually eat out once or twice a week.
I'm glad we have so much in common! It was nice talking to you.
You too! It was nice talking to you too.
